verses.roman:
āpane rathera pāche ṭhele māthā diyā
haḍ haḍ kari, ratha calila dhāiyā

synonyms: āpane—personally; rathera pāche—at the back of the car; ṭhele—pushes; māthā diyā—with His head; haḍ haḍ kari—making a rattling sound; ratha—the car; calila—began to move; dhāiyā—running.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu then went to the back of the car and began to push with His head. It was then that the car began to move and ramble along, making a rattling sound.
